title: Prince of Persia: Warrior Within font
content:
i need to identify this font, for another person  
 [http://img145.imageshack.us/img145/909/wwyr1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20111228161935/http:/img145.imageshack.us/img145/909/wwyr1.png "http://img145.imageshack.us/img145/909/wwyr1.png")
author: ENi

comments.content:
To me this looks like a heavily customized version of some heavy-weight serif font, with a strong angled stress (see the O), like an Albertus-based font from FontBank called [Anthony](http://web.archive.org/web/20111228161935/http:/www.buyfonts.com/value_for_money/anthony.htm). The 'horns' on each letter are add-ons and the longer legs were done just for this logo. I wonder if this is not a font, but a customized logo. Are there any other words that use this lettering?

- Mike Yanega
